commit message: Started implementation of #93: Ability to attach and view images

org.andstatus.app.context.MyContextHolder.myFutureContext

Conversations Activity'
Preparing to refactor AvatarData

Updated German translation

Merge pull request #118 from vinzv/master

Updated German translation
#93 Ability to view attached images implemented
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'
#93: Pruning attachments implemented
Converter to AndStatus database v.17 implemented

Fixed: User timeline worked correctly in Combined mode only.
Fixed: Cannot load next timeline page if previous position was stored,
when too few rows existed.

Global search is available from any timeline. Switch to Public timeline
is automatic.

Added an option to set Default Account (account, which timeline is
opened on application launch)

HTML support allowed by default for all systems
